title: Article1
introtext: EasyBlog is a professionally designed joomla tool that comes as a solution for all types of joomla powered blogs. This is a social media friendly extension and incorporates wide range of features like inbuilt comment and review system, mobile friendly designs and much more. This is an awesome blogging component and provides support for SEO on your blogs. So don&#2013266066;t get a second thought, get it now.
